count.description: Number of products in this category.

id.description: ID of the top-level category listed.

image.description: `{{*.image}}` object used by various objects such as `{{category.image}}`, `{{product.images[*]}}`

alt.description: corresponding text to display for missing images, accessible screen readers, etc.
